message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is truly exceptional and worth every penny. Considering its value and quality, I propose a price of $15000 for it. This offer includes not only the product itself but also exclusive access to our VIP support for a year. I believe this deal presents an excellent opportunity for both of us.

I appreciate the offer, but I'm on a budget and I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. I'm really interested in the product, but I think that's the most I can afford. I'd love to hear if you can meet me at this price.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and I'm willing to negotiate. However, due to the high demand and limited supply of our premium product, I can't go below $12000. This offer includes everything you're looking for and more. Please let me know if this is within your range.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $12000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. How about we discuss a price of $9500? I think that's a fair price for the product, and I'd be happy to make a decision if you can meet me at that price.

I'm glad you're still interested in our product, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After considering your offer, I believe we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement. I am willing to accept $10000 for the product, including all the additional benefits. This is the best offer I can make, given the value and exclusivity of the product.
